events.name: FREE Data Science Info Session @ CodeGakko
events.description:
Have a background in coding but wish to learn more? Or maybe no background at all? Here at CodeGakko, we'll be hosting a second FREE info session. Basic concepts of Data Science such as regression and classification, data models, applications of data science, as well as a live demonstration using Python will be showcased. 
Details of the info session are as follows:
Date: 1st April 2018Time: 2 pm - 3.30 pmVenue: Adam Khoo Learning Centre @ West Coast PlazaPrice: FREE!

Interested participants need to pay a fee of $5 to UOB Corporate Account Number: 3753067173 before taking a ticket. This is to ensure turn ups and the $5 will be reimbursed on the spot on 1st April upon attendance to the event. Upon completing the transaction, please email the transaction receipt to matthew@codegakko.com
Bring your friends along and we look forward to seeing you there!
Feel free to contact us for any enquiries at info@codegakko.com or you could check out our website at http://www.codegakko.com/
events.location: Adam Khoo Learning Center @ West Coast Plaza, #01-75 West Coast Plaza, Singapore 127371
